PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-00882022-02-03,  ,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectOrder providing financial assistance to British Columbia agricultural producers to mitigate and recover from the adverse effects of excess rainfall and flooding in that province in 2021.
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to enter into an AGREEMENT WITH THE PROVINCE OF BRITISH COLUMBIA in order to provide federal contributions of up to $120 million to mitigate and recover from the adverse effects of excess rainfall and flooding in that province in 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
